question: What part of the motorcycle is fitted?
options: The front fender of the motorcycle is fitted.
The side mirror of the motorcycle is fitted.
The exhaust pipe of the motorcycle is fitted.

inference.prompt:

(B) The side mirror of the motorcycle is fitted.
